entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
